body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16770](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16770.html) (Chainparams: Decouple AllowAcceptNonstd() from IsTestChain() by jtimon)
* [#16745](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16745.html) (wallet: Translate all initErrors in CreateWalletFromFile by MarcoFalke)
* [#16661](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16661.html) (wallet: Fix segfault in CreateWalletFromFile, Pass error to rpc caller by MarcoFalke)
* [#16527](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16527.html) (B: Get rid of Params().RequireStandard() by jtimon)
* [#16526](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16526.html) (A: Chainparams: Rename RequireStandard() to DefaultAcceptNonstd() by jtimon)
* [#16524](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16524.html) (Wallet: Disable -fallbackfee by default by jtimon)
* [#16224](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16224.html) (gui: Bilingual GUI error messages by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
